short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DS5Chrome lets you use your DualSense Controller in Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The DualSense Controller for the PS5 does not work out of the box with Chrome. There are issues where the controller is incorrectly mapped and makes it impossible for Chrome to understand what the controller is doing. This extension allows you to just plug in your DS5 controller and not have to worry about any weird bugs.
